preparation_steps: ['Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.', 'In a pan, heat olive oil and sauté onion and garlic.', 'Add ground beef and cook until browned.', 'Stir in tomato sauce, salt, and pepper.', 'Simmer for 20 minutes.', 'Serve Bolognese sauce over cooked spaghetti.']
['Marinate chicken in soy sauce, ginger, and garlic.', 'Stir-fry chicken until cooked.', 'Add bell peppers and broccoli.', 'Stir in soy sauce.', 'Serve over cooked rice.']

['Cook quinoa according to package instructions.', 'Chop cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and red onion.', 'Mix quinoa with vegetables and feta cheese.', 'Drizzle with lemon juice and olive oil.', 'Season with salt and pepper.']
['Season beef strips with spices and sear in a hot pan.', 'Warm taco shells in the oven.', 'Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, tomato, cheese, sour cream, avocado, onion, and cilantro.']
['Season salmon with olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper.', 'Roast in the oven with vegetables for 20 minutes.', 'Serve hot.']

['Cook pasta according to package instructions.', 'Blanch broccoli, carrots, and zucchini.', 'Sauté garlic in olive oil.', 'Add blanched vegetables and cherry tomatoes.', 'Toss with pasta, basil, and Parmesan cheese.']

['Marinate chicken legs in BBQ sauce.', 'Grill until cooked through.', 'Shred cabbage and carrots for coleslaw.', 'Mix mayonnaise, apple cider vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper for dressing.', 'Toss coleslaw vegetables in dressing.']
